LanguageData.WaterWellInlet.label: Water Well
LanguageData.WaterWellInlet.description: Accesses ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. The presence of sewage or other pollution will reduce water quality and can cause contamination.
LanguageData.WaterWellInlet_Blueprint.label: Water Well (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterWellInlet_Frame.label: Water Well (building)
LanguageData.WaterWellInlet_Frame.description: Accesses ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. The presence of sewage or other pollution will reduce water quality and can cause contamination.
LanguageData.DeepWaterWellInlet.label: Deep Water Well
LanguageData.DeepWaterWellInlet.description: Accesses a large area of ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. Deep wells are unaffected by pollution.
LanguageData.DeepWaterWellInlet_Blueprint.label: Deep Water Well (blueprint)
LanguageData.DeepWaterWellInlet_Frame.label: Deep Water Well (building)
LanguageData.DeepWaterWellInlet_Frame.description: Accesses a large area of ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. Deep wells are unaffected by pollution.
LanguageData.WaterButt.label: Water Butt
LanguageData.WaterButt.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterButt_Blueprint.label: Water Butt (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterButt_Blueprint_Install.label: Water Butt (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterButt_Frame.label: Water Butt (building)
LanguageData.WaterButt_Frame.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterTowerS.label: Water Tower
LanguageData.WaterTowerS.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterTowerS_Blueprint.label: Water Tower (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterTowerS_Frame.label: Water Tower (building)
LanguageData.WaterTowerS_Frame.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterTowerL.label: Huge Water Tower
LanguageData.WaterTowerL.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterTowerL_Blueprint.label: Huge Water Tower (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterTowerL_Frame.label: Huge Water Tower (building)
LanguageData.WaterTowerL_Frame.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WindPump.label: Wind Pump
LanguageData.WindPump.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 3000 L/day
LanguageData.WindPump_Blueprint.label: Wind Pump (blueprint)
LanguageData.WindPump_Frame.label: Wind Pump (building)
LanguageData.WindPump_Frame.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 3000 L/day
LanguageData.ElectricPump.label: Electric Pump
LanguageData.ElectricPump.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 1500 L/day
LanguageData.ElectricPump_Blueprint.label: Electric Pump (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricPump_Blueprint_Install.label: Electric Pump (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricPump_Frame.label: Electric Pump (building)
LanguageData.ElectricPump_Frame.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 1500 L/day
LanguageData.PumpingStation.label: Pumping Station
LanguageData.PumpingStation.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 10000 L/day
LanguageData.PumpingStation_Blueprint.label: Pumping Station (blueprint)
LanguageData.PumpingStation_Frame.label: Pumping Station (building)
LanguageData.PumpingStation_Frame.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 10000 L/day
LanguageData.SewageOutlet.label: Desagüe de aguas residuales
LanguageData.SewageOutlet.description: Desagüe de aguas residuales que puede construirse a lo largo de un río y conectarse a los accesorios del baño.
LanguageData.SewageOutlet_Blueprint.label: Desagüe de aguas residuales (plano)
LanguageData.SewageOutlet_Frame.label: Desagüe de aguas residuales (construcción)
LanguageData.SewageOutlet_Frame.description: Desagüe de aguas residuales que puede construirse a lo largo de un río y conectarse a los accesorios del baño.
LanguageData.SewageSepticTank.label: Septic Tank
LanguageData.SewageSepticTank.description: Slowly cleans sewage over time. Sewage is directed to septic tanks first. If it reaches full capacity then excess sewage is sent to sewage outlets.
LanguageData.SewageSepticTank_Blueprint.label: Septic Tank (blueprint)
LanguageData.SewageSepticTank_Frame.label: Septic Tank (building)
LanguageData.SewageSepticTank_Frame.description: Slowly cleans sewage over time. Sewage is directed to septic tanks first. If it reaches full capacity then excess sewage is sent to sewage outlets.
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.label: Tratamiento de aguas residuales
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.description: Limpia lentamente las aguas residuales con el tiempo. Las aguas residuales se dirigen primero a las plantas de tratamiento, donde se elimina el 90%, y el 10% restante se envía a los puntos de desagüe; si alcanzan su plena capacidad, el exceso de aguas residuales se envía directamente a los puntos de desagüe sin tratamiento.
LanguageData.SewageTreatment_Blueprint.label: Tratamiento de aguas residuales (plano)
LanguageData.SewageTreatment_Frame.label: Tratamiento de aguas residuales (construcción)
LanguageData.SewageTreatment_Frame.description: Limpia lentamente las aguas residuales con el tiempo. Las aguas residuales se dirigen primero a las plantas de tratamiento, donde se elimina el 90%, y el 10% restante se envía a los puntos de desagüe; si alcanzan su plena capacidad, el exceso de aguas residuales se envía directamente a los puntos de desagüe sin tratamiento.
LanguageData.WaterTreatment.label: Water Treatment
LanguageData.WaterTreatment.description: Cleans 99.99% of germs! Filters existing water in storage towers, and any water used by fixtures, eliminating the risk of disease
LanguageData.WaterTreatment_Blueprint.label: Water Treatment (blueprint)
LanguageData.WaterTreatment_Frame.label: Water Treatment (building)
LanguageData.WaterTreatment_Frame.description: Cleans 99.99% of germs! Filters existing water in storage towers, and any water used by fixtures, eliminating the risk of disease
